DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the factors that affect Aricept medication persistence rate and the safety and efficacy in patients with Alzheimer's Disease in clinical practice
DOC.brief_title: Post-marketing Surveillance of Donepezil Hydrochloride -Investigation of the Factors That Affect Aricept Medication Persistence Rate and the Safety and Efficacy in Patients With Alzheimer's Disease in Clinical Practice
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Patients diagnosed with Alzheimer's Disease and administered Aricept for the first time. Exclusion criteria: Patients with a history of hypersensitivity to any ingredients of Aricept or piperidine derivatives.
